timeline.bodyText: I thought we were moving away from safety valves? This uses another one?
timeline.author: risdenk

replies.bodyText: @risdenk unfortunately we can only moving aways if we have fix property in CM side
replies.author: doktoric

replies.bodyText:
Yea agreed - CB-4191 is being used to track a bunch of this. Is there a CM jira to add a specific property and a CB one to remove this use of safety valve? Otherwise we are going to keep fighting up a hill.
This looks like a new Spark CSD so it should be possible to add the specific config and then CB wouldn't need to deal w/ this safety valve.
replies.author: risdenk
